text: aur (khuda kee shaan dekho) ek kaafala (vahaan) aakar utara un logon ne apane sakke (paanee bharane vaale) ko (paanee bharane) bheja garaz usane apana dol daala hee tha (ki yoosuph usamen baithe aur usane kheecha to nikal aae) vah pukaara aaha ye to ladaka hai aur kaaphala vaalo ne yoosuph ko qeematee saramaaya samajhakar chhipa rakha haaloki jo kuchh ye log karate the khuda usase khoob vaakiph tha
